page.title: 04St.Michael's Church.
page.content: The population of Skelbrooke is{110. In the village centre there is a small church called{St. Michael's and All {Angels'.}The church was built in the 12th century and in{1872}was{rebuilt {after a fire .}The vicar is called Father Reynolds and he has been there for 4 years . In a week there are 2 services, one on Sunday at 9:30am, and the other on Thursday also at 9.30am. There are very few special services.{ The last{christening was on the{15th {July 1984},the last {burial}was in { {September 1984}and the last {wedding} was on the {3rd April 1983}. In the summer the church organises{fairs, {barn dances}and other events . In the winter there are {card games, beetle {drives }and other indoor activities. Mr.Lockwood loans his barn for these events.
